name: TPG Software
overview:
As developers of investment accounting and management software, our goal is to streamline your front-to-back office accounting solutions. TPGâ€™s mission encompasses providing front-middle-back office accounting software tools that support the complicated securities created by Wall Street, maintain solutions to comply with regulatory guidelines, and deliver products built on industry-standard software platforms such as Microsoft.

Founded in 1991, TPG Software, Inc. has been providing investment accounting software solutions that support trading, comprehensive investment analysis and reporting, investment, liability, and derivative accounting, client safekeeping, and risk and collateral management. TPGâ€™s creative investment portfolio management systems have provided intuitive solutions for the financial industry.

TPG’s technology solutions and strong investment accounting systems continue to set the standard for the financial industry. With a data-hub central to our model, TPG centralizes the data integration, validation and dissemination process within your organization and system architecture. By leveraging one platform for all your lines of business, you can significantly improve workflows by removing the inherent inefficiencies associated with a â€œsiloâ€ approach to data management.

Whether you are looking for a single accounting solution, a full enterprise-wide solution, or something in between, TPG’s open system design enables your organization to implement an accounting solution that meets your immediate needs without sacrificing long-term business objectives. Our approach continues to be embraced by the financial community by providing several advantages, including:

Operational Efficiencies and Reduced Risk Real-time enterprise-wide integration streamlines workflows and improves access to quality data for your organization. Increased Business Agility Our system design allows your traders, business analysts, and portfolio managers to react rapidly to industry changes as they occur. Architecture Scalability Whether you operate on a single server/computer in a low volume environment, on a large data center, or something in between, our system design supports the processing volumes you demand. Cost of Ownership Our advanced technology supports multiple businesses on one platform, and improved product releases delivered via the Web reduces your cost of ownership.
